forecasts.raw_text: SW winds 20 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt. Seas 5 to 7 ft. Wave detail: S 7 ft at 7 seconds and NE 3 ft at 12 seconds. A chance of showers late.

forecasts.raw_text: SW winds 15 to 20 kt with gusts up to 25 kt, becoming W 10 to 15 kt after midnight. Seas 4 to 6 ft. Wave detail: S 6 ft at 7 seconds and NE 4 ft at 11 seconds. A slight chance of rain after midnight. Patchy fog after midnight with vsby 1 to 3 nm.
